definitions.text: a series of mental images and emotions occurring during sleep
examples: I had a dream about you last night

definitions.text: imaginative thoughts indulged in while awake
examples: he lives in a dream that has nothing to do with reality
his ambition is to own his own business

definitions.text: a fantastic but vain hope (from fantasies induced by the opium pipe)
examples: I have this pipe dream about being emperor of the universe

definitions.text: a state of mind characterized by abstraction and release from reality
examples: he went about his work as if in a dream

definitions.text: have a daydream; indulge in a fantasy
